about_the_game:
welcome to Hinami bay, a private island where you're free to roam and talk to whatever girl you like. Even seduce them. If you don't have luck with the ladies, try working out or reading at the library to improve your chances.
Hinami Bay features a third person view, in a mini open world. Explore this island day and night to find unique girls.
Raise your stats to talk to higher level girls.
Go to the gym to raise your strength and gain experience.
Go to the library to improve your intelligence and gain experience.
Work at various locations for spending cash.
If your heart gets broken too many times, fix it at the hospital.
If you work too much, or study too much you'll need to take a rest at the hotel.
Most importantly, have fun!

content_descriptors.notes: Talk to girls on the beach to get nude photos. Some of the girls dance naked, and unlock an album of all the collected photos. photos include girls in sexual positions, girls stripping, girls in POV sex with penis in picture, and girls getting off with sex toys.

detailed_description:
welcome to Hinami bay, a private island where you're free to roam and talk to whatever girl you like. Even seduce them. If you don't have luck with the ladies, try working out or reading at the library to improve your chances.
Hinami Bay features a third person view, in a mini open world. Explore this island day and night to find unique girls.
Raise your stats to talk to higher level girls.
Go to the gym to raise your strength and gain experience.
Go to the library to improve your intelligence and gain experience.
Work at various locations for spending cash.
If your heart gets broken too many times, fix it at the hospital.
If you work too much, or study too much you'll need to take a rest at the hotel.
Most importantly, have fun!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04 or newer
  • Processor: Dual core from Intel or AMD at 2.8 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD GCN+, NVIDIA Kepler+, or Intel HD 5000-series or newer
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: OpenAL Compatible Sound Card

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: High Sierra 10.13+
  • Processor: x64 architecture with SSE2
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal capable Intel and AMD GPUs
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

name: HinamiBay

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: windows 10
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-7400 CPU @ 3.00GHz, 3000 Mhz, 4 Core(s), 4 Logical Processor(s)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 256 mb video memory, shader model 3.0+
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible

short_description: Hinami Bay is a casual, mini open-world hentai game. Talk to girls on a private island and train yourself to become smarter and stronger, so have a better chance with the ladies.
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Arabic*, Bulgarian*, Czech*, Danish*, Dutch*, Finnish*, Greek*, Hungarian*, Japanese*, Korean*, Norwegian*, Polish*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Portuguese - Portugal*, Romanian*, Russian*, Simplified Chinese*, Spanish - Latin America*, Swedish*, Thai*, Traditional Chinese*, Turkish*, Ukrainian*, Vietnamese*, Afrikaans*, Albanian*, Amharic*, Armenian*, Assamese*, Azerbaijani*, Bangla*, Basque*, Belarusian*, Bosnian*, Catalan*, Cherokee*, Croatian*, Dari*, Estonian*, Filipino*, Galician*, Georgian*, Gujarati*, Hausa*, Hebrew*, Hindi*, Icelandic*, Igbo*, Indonesian*, Irish*, K'iche'*, Kannada*, Kazakh*, Khmer*, Kinyarwanda*, Konkani*, Kyrgyz*, Latvian*, Lithuanian*, Luxembourgish*, Macedonian*, Malay*, Malayalam*, Maltese*, Maori*, Marathi*, Mongolian*, Nepali*, Odia*, Persian*, Punjabi (Gurmukhi)*, Punjabi (Shahmukhi)*, Quechua*, Scots*, Serbian*, Sindhi*, Sinhala*, Slovak*, Slovenian*, Sorani*, Sotho*, Swahili*, Tajik*, Tamil*, Tatar*, Telugu*, Tigrinya*, Tswana*, Turkmen*, Urdu*, Uyghur*, Uzbek*, Valencian*, Welsh*, Wolof*, Xhosa*, Yoruba*, Zulu*
